description:
net: revert Zone in IPNet temporally

Update issue 4501.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Sat, Mar 16, 2013 at 12:55 PM, Rob Pike <r@golang.org> wrote:
> Why?

Because of Russ suggested, and I agreed.

We have agreed on new Zone API in Go 1.1 almost but haven't
agreed yet that whether Zone in IPNet should be Go 1.1 API.
In either case we should focus on basic stuff except IPNet first
so that Zone API makes the cut in Go 1.1.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f12b24ea373f ***

net: revert Zone in IPNet temporally

Update issue 4501.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
